content: corner sts just made *1 fptc in next fptc from round 8 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 1 reverse special fpdc in same fptc just worked and next single_crochet 1 special fpdc using next single_crochet & next fptc from round 8 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts including hidden st behind st just made 1 fptc in same fptc just worked skip next st 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1hdc over top of half_double_crochet from previous round skip next st ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 fptc in next fptc from round 8 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 1 reverse special fpdc in same fptc just worked and next single_crochet 1 special fpdc using same st as ch1 & the 1st fptc to the left of current st from round 8 1 single_crochet in next 6 sts including hidden st behind st just made for both colorways drop current color & pick up color a slip_stitch into 1st st 64 single_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 4 double_crochet 8 fpdc 8 fptc round 13 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next st should be the double_crochet in the corner *1 single_crochet in next 22 sts 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 single_crochet in last 19 sts for original colorway only drop color a & pick up color b for tri-color colorway only drop color a & pick up color c slip_stitch to 1st st 96 single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet round 14 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet special fpdc3tog using the fptc you just passed work over top of corner st from previous round and the next fptc this makes a corner *1 single_crochet in next 11 sts 1st st may be hidden because of corner st just made work a fpdc cross st using next 2 fpdc from round 12 skip next 2 sts in previous round 1 single_crochet in next 11 sts special fpdc3tog using the fptc you just passed work over top of corner st from previous round and the next fptc makes next corner st ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 single_crochet in next 11 sts fpdc cross st using last 2 fpdc from round 12 1 single_crochet in last 8 sts for original colorway only drop color b & pick up color a for tri-color colorway only drop color c & pick up color a slip_stitch in 1st st 88 single_crochet 12 fpdc round 15 chain 1 1 half_double_crochet over top of next 2 single_crochet from previous round 5 fpdc around next fpdc *1 half_double_crochet over top of next 11 single_crochet from previous round 1st single_crochet may be hidden 1 bphdc around next 2 fpdc 1 half_double_crochet over top of next 11 single_crochet from previous round 5 fpdc around next fpdc ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 half_double_crochet over top of next
